DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine optimal skin closure technique ( staples versus subcuticular suture ) time cesarean delivery Class III obese woman body mass index ( BMI ) > /= 40kg/m2 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Staples Versus Subcuticular Suture Class III Obese Women Undergoing Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women > 18 year old undergoing cesarean delivery 2 . BMI > /= 40 kg/m2 determine height weight report admission 3 . Live gestation 23 week great 4 . Women able followup 714 day hospital discharge visual wound check.. 1 . Active lupus flare 2 . HIV/AIDS 3 . Current treatment cancer h/o radiation abdomen/pelvis 4 . Hypersensitivity steristrips
